remarks: Identity equivalent to the value of the zero vector.  Provides a convenient way to compute the value.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:

0vlid.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
0vlid.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lmod0vid $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( ( X .+ X ) = X <-> .0. = X ) ) $.
